login.title: Login
login.onlyWebAvailable: Login is only available in the web version.
login.magicLinkLabel: or sign in with magic link

toasts.magicLinkSent: Magic link sent! Check your email.
toasts.googleError: Failed to sign in with Google

signup.title: Create Account
signup.onlyWebAvailable: Account creation is only available in the web version.
signup.mailingListLabel: I consent to receiving updates and emails

toasts.signupSuccess: Sign up and login completed successfully!
toasts.signupCompleteEmailConfirm: Sign up completed! Please confirm the email address sent to you.
toasts.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during sign up.
toasts.profileUpdateError: Sign up succeeded, but profile update failed. Please update it on the profile page.

security.title: Security
security.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
security.googleUserMessage: You are logged in with Google. Password management is done through your Google account.

notFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. The link might be broken or the page may have been removed.

unsubscribe.processingMessage: Please wait while we process your request...

reminder.title: Reminders Successfully Disabled
reminder.message: You will no longer receive monthly reminders. You can re-enable them in the app settings.

all.title: Successfully Unsubscribed
all.message: You have been removed from our mailing list. You will no longer receive emails from Ten10.

invalidToken.title: Invalid Link
invalidToken.message: The link you clicked is invalid or has expired.

expiredToken.title: Link Expired
expiredToken.message: The link you clicked has expired. Please go to the app settings.

general.title: Error
general.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

updateFailed.title: Error
updateFailed.message: An error occurred while updating preferences. Please try again later.
